thread.title: Do You Believe Nokia or BlackBerry Will Have Success in 2017?
thread.title_full: Do You Believe Nokia or BlackBerry Will Have Success in 2017?

author: Aamir Siddiqui
title: Do You Believe Nokia or BlackBerry Will Have Success in 2017?
text:
This year will mark the return of several phone lines that once occupied the pinnacle of mobile communications. Samsung is looking to bounce back from the Note 7 , and so is LG from the G5 . But alongside the usual suspects, we also see BlackBerry and Nokia mounting a stronger return this year.
BlackBerry had decided to outsource all of its manufacturing efforts , and we are waiting to see its first device since this decision. Nokia on the other hand, looks to make a comeback with the help of HMD Global. It even has managed to generate quite some interest for its first Android handset since the split from Microsoft.
So, our discussion for today:
Will BlackBerry or Nokia be able to make it big in 2017? Or will they be among the many who were hyped but failed to perform? How far will their brand goodwill take each of them this year? Should these companies adopt any different approaches to taste success? Let us know in the comments below!
Let us know in the comments below!
